def chunked\_file\_upload(file\_path, chunk\_size=8192, **upload\_params):
for i in range(0, file\_path.seek(0, 2), chunk\_size):
\# Move the read position to i
file\_path.seek(i)
\# Read the next chunk
chunk = file\_path.read(chunk\_size)
\# If this is the last chunk, adjust the size
if len(chunk) < chunk\_size:
\# Perform upload
response = upload\_to\_server(chunk, **upload\_params)
else:
\# Perform upload
response = upload\_to\_server(chunk, **upload\_params)
return response
